title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.

OB: 

EB: Change the Display type to Combo Box

Expected result: The default value for the list box should be 'aaa'. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.

Actual result: No default value is set for the list box. After step 5, the OK button can still be used.

SR: 1. Open the report parameter settings. 2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'. 3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'. 4. Verify that the default value is not retained and the OK button is still active.
